mapper.select: select * from (select ZFB_ID, user_name userName, application_id applicationId, identity_card identityCard, verifyResult, addrScore, zmScore, results, decode(isInstinct,'1','已导入','0','未导入') isInstinct, decode(is_local,'1','调库','0','非调库') isLocal, get_split_reason(calltype,'ZMXY_QUERY_TYPE','-') callType , to_char(call_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') call_date, to_char(record_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') record_date, taobaoTrade, bizCustomer, verifyScore, realType, tradeInfoLife, tradeInfoFinance, tradeInfoMaterial, bindFastPayment, responseDate, beStudent, custLevel, consumeMonthly, consumeSingle, capitalFund, cosumeLuxury, creditHistory, honestyScene, deadbeat, consumeLevel, consumeStability, payLevel, alipayActivity, alipayScene, interest, snsInfluence, contactsStability, phonebility from pf_zfb_record pf where pf.application_id = #{applicationId} order by pf.call_date desc ) where rownum = 1
